/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/example_pg.dir/example_pg.o  -o example_pg  -L/home/mpi_share/env/yed_gloo/gloo_glex/installed/gloo_glex/lib  -L/usr/local/glex/lib  -L/home/mpi_share/env/gloo_etc/installed/hiredis-1.0.0/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/mpi_share/env/yed_gloo/gloo_glex/installed/gloo_glex/lib:/usr/local/glex/lib:/home/mpi_share/env/gloo_etc/installed/hiredis-1.0.0/lib -lgloo -lpthread -lsharp -lsharp_coll -lglex -lhiredis
